com.github.wuic.nut.core
Class DiskNutDao

java.lang.Object
  com.github.wuic.util.PollingScheduler<NutDaoListener>
      com.github.wuic.nut.AbstractNutDao
          com.github.wuic.nut.core.PathNutDao
              com.github.wuic.nut.core.DiskNutDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
NutDao, Runnable
public class DiskNutDao
extends PathNutDao

A NutDao implementation for disk accesses.

The DAO is based on the DirectoryPath from the path API designed for WUIC.

Since:
0.3.1
Version:
1.4
Author:
Guillaume DROUET

Constructor Detail

DiskNutDao

public DiskNutDao(String base,
                  Boolean basePathAsSysProp,
                  String[] proxies,
                  int pollingSeconds,
                  Boolean regex,
                  Boolean contentBasedVersionNumber)

Builds a new instance with a base directory.

Parameters:
base - the directory where we have to look up
basePathAsSysProp - true if the base path is a system property
pollingSeconds - the interleave for polling operations in seconds (-1 to deactivate)
proxies - the proxies URIs in front of the nut
regex - if the path should be considered as a regex or not
contentBasedVersionNumber - true if version number is computed from nut content, false if based on timestamp

                                     throws IOException

Creates the DirectoryPath associated to the AbstractNutDao.basePath.

Returns:
the DirectoryPath
Throws:
